review: Love it!  Loads quickly & great picture!
author: Kira Moses

review: So far a very frustrating experience. The fire stick connected to my wifi then would drop and reconnect. Had no trouble with apple tv. Tried restarting the router. restarting the fire stick . still no luck. Finally added the extender and it seems to work.One hour of my life wasted. So far the picture is not very high resolution, apple tv was perfect HD. Thinking about sending it back.
author: Barley Brewer "Greg"

review: Easy to set up.  Have Fire TV for my main TV, bought this for my 2nd one.  Love both!
author: Audrey Horman

review: Very easy to setup. Works great!

review: This product is worth the money to be able to watch movies on your home TV! I recommend this product.
